pageContext.claim: “Number one, you don't know what they're doing, and when you read it in The Washington Post, you don't believe it. I don't. I believe very little what I see [responding to a report in The Post that Russia, China and Iran are waging a coronavirus disinformation campaign targeting the United States].”
pageContext.analysis: Trump was asked about an article in The Washington Post about coronavirus disinformation campaigns targeting the United States by China, Iran and Russia. Trump had a curious response. He denied that The Post article was credible, and then immediately afterward confirmed that China was spreading disinformation about the United States and the virus.
